data_description.apps: Here you can define the list of applications, specify names and icons that will be displayed in the UI.
data_description.enable_ime: Enable this option to be able to get the current app name and send text as keyboard input. Disable it for devices that show 'Use keyboard on mobile device screen' instead of the on-screen keyboard.

data_description.app_name: Name of the application as you would like it to be displayed in Home Assistant.
data_description.app_icon: Image URL. From the Play Store app page, right click on the icon and select 'Copy image address' and then paste it here. Alternatively, download the image, upload it under /config/www/ and use the URL /local/filename
data_description.app_delete: Check this box to delete the application from the list.
